Summary: "Surfboard" shaped, opaque or gray from side, black from underneath with small semicircular "wing like" projections from middle sides, shimmering appearance from side, tail tapered to point as viewed from beneath.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Petersburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was returning from virginia traveling south on i-85 sunday, oct 11, 2009, about 9 am, on a clear, sunny day...few clouds. i saw an object ahead of me appearing at first to be a narrow portion of a cloud, but quickly realized it was not a cloud. it was approximately 1-1\2 miles ahead and passing very slowly over the interstate highway, from the east toward the west or wnw. it appeared gray, almost opaque, but had a "shimmering" appearance. at first i considered it to be some type of advertisement pulled by an airplane but it was so very long i quickly dismissed that, also. marking it by other structures i slowed down (traffic, though not heavy, was 75 mph at that point)...when i could finally get to a clear spot (each side of 85 are obstructed by high banks and pine trees) i could view the object from behind and beneath it...now appearing pitch black, surfboard shaped with a tapered tail and small winglike projections from the sides at the middle. it took awhile to get past it and i really could not get a clear view for very long. however, judging the altitude (about 200- 300 feet off the ground) and time it took to pass, i felt as if it was simply moving very slowly or floating. because of the area involved (swamp and wood lands) i was unable to visualize it for very long. i guess it moved across the highway at about 20-25 mph and would have to guess the whole object was about 200-300 yards long and about 75 yards wide.it was certainly something that i have never seen before..i have seen other aircraft including the stealth bomber and this object was none of those. i have never witnessed a ufo before and delayed reporting this because i didn't know how. i am a physician and was alone in the car. after talking with our sc state mufon director, she encouraged me to report the incident. she was also helpful in assuring me i was not crazy!!!
